summary: This document is correspondence regarding a sealed order and a letter in response to the court's July 27, 2020 order in the grand jury subpoena case 19-mc-00179. It involves communication with Judge Sarah Netburn's chambers and requests for filings under seal.

persons.name: Sarah Netburn
persons.context: Addressed as the recipient of the correspondence; her courtroom deputy is involved in the communication regarding a sealed order in case 19-mc-00179.

events.title: Court Order Issued
events.description: The Court issued an order in the grand jury subpoena case 19-mc-00179, prompting a response letter to be filed under seal.

locations: United States District Court Southern District of New York
keyFacts: The document references grand jury subpoena case 19-mc-00179, indicating ongoing sealed proceedings.
A letter was submitted in response to a July 27, 2020 court order, requested to be filed under seal.
Communication involves Judge Sarah Netburn's chambers and a courtroom deputy, highlighting judicial oversight of sealed materials.
